title: Adutha Paruppu Lyrics Rendavudhu Padam Lyrics

Music: Kannan
Movie: Rendavudhu Padam

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
adutha paruppu naanthaanda
maama nee autograph-u vaangen da

paduthukitte jeyipenda aama
nee press meetu vaiyenda
(yaar petha pillaye ippadi
kiru pidichu alayudhu)

Yen kaatil mazhayada
vandhu kaala pidingada

Naan vandhu ninnaa
cameravum fan-u aagum da
naan kaithudaika check-u book-um
tissue aagum da

en face-u vandha TRp-um
aegiri pogum da

en photo-kuda copy right-il
kaasu allum da

adutha paruppu naanthaanda
maama nee autograph-u vaangen da

paduthukitte jeyipenda aama
nee press meetu vaiyenda

(ennada satham ..
yedho saavu machi ..
indha naayi saaga matingudhey

machaan adutha prabhu dheva
ivan thaanda
edhula machaan..
apppadilaam ketkakudaadhu)

fashion showla ramp walk poven
ad-u film-la shampoo vippen

..
Friendsu thaanda usuru enaku
paadhi sotha ezhudhi veppen

Naan yeni pottu mela yera poren
naan yelaikellaam vaari tharra poren
en rasikar mandra thalaivar neethanda

edhuku edhuku naye indha
aagaadha aasa
vidya vidiya suttaaalum nee
vegaadha dhosa
ketkuravab kenaiyilla
venaamda boss-u

nee atom bombu illa maachan
oosi pattaasu
yei.

adutha paruppu naanthaanda
maama nee autograph-u vaangen da

paduthukitte jeyipenda aama
nee press meetu vaiyenda

Naan vandhu ninnaa
camera
...poitaangala ....ok ..
